string-array.name: record_scenes_summaries
string-array.item: Matsa da renon kusa da mafitan sautin dan kyautatata muryan
Sa wayar tsakanin mutane biyu domin ka yi naɗin tattaunawar su so sai
Babban fanni na fasaha na bada dama ma reno ya yi daukar cikakkiyar sauti

string-array.name: record_scenes_summaries_stereo
string-array.item: Naɗa ta hanyar tashoshi 2, saurari sauti na stereo a cikin na\'urar kunni
Matsa da renon kusa da mafitan sautin dan kyautatata muryan
Sa wayar tsakanin mutane biyu domin ka yi naɗin tattaunawar su so sai
Babban fanni na fasaha na bada dama ma reno ya yi daukar cikakkiyar sauti
